API

Directive: MdcCheckboxInputDirective

Selector: input[mdcCheckboxInput][type=checkbox]

Directive for the input element of an MdcCheckboxDirective.

Directive: MdcCheckboxDirective

Selector: [mdcCheckbox]

Directive for creating a Material Design checkbox. The checkbox is driven by an underlying native checkbox input, which must use the MdcCheckboxInputDirective directive. The current implementation will add all other required DOM elements (such as the background). Future implementations will also support supplying (customized) background elements.

This directive can be used together with an mdcFormField to easily position checkboxes and their labels, see mdcFormField.
